title: Roman Relics
credit_line: Purchase with funds from an anonymous donor
provenance_text:
Tom Rowlands [1925-], Pittsburgh, PA, until December 1955 [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1955.
  
Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 253 in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the International for Carnegie Institute with funds provided by an anonymous donor.
